@Version(value="1.0") @Export(optional="provide:=true")

Package org.apache.jackrabbit.oak.plugins.index.lucene.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FacetsConfigProvider
    Ensures that FacetsConfig is lazily created only when facets are to be created and only for those indexes where facets are configured
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompoundWordTokenFilterBase
    Base class for decomposition token filters.
    CompressingCodec
    Lucene Codec aimed to reduce index size as much as possible by enabling highest possible compression on term vectors and stored fields.
    ConfigUtil  
    CRTokenizer
    A CharTokenizer dividing tokens at \n.
    FacetHelper  
    FunctionIndexProcessor
    A parser for function-based indexes.
    IndexDefinitionBuilder  
    IndexDefinitionBuilder.AggregateRule  
    IndexDefinitionBuilder.AggregateRule.Include  
    IndexDefinitionBuilder.IndexRule  
    IndexDefinitionBuilder.PropertyRule  
    LuceneIndexHelper  
    LuceneInitializerHelper  
    MoreLikeThisHelper
    Helper class for generating a MoreLikeThisQuery from the native query String
    OakWordTokenFilter  
    PathStoredFieldVisitor  
    SpellcheckHelper
    Helper class for getting spellcheck results for a given term, calling a DirectSpellChecker under the hood.
    SpellcheckHelper.SpellcheckQuery  
    SuggestHelper
    Helper class for getting suggest results for a given term, calling a Lookup implementation under the hood.
    SuggestHelper.SuggestQuery  
    TapeSampling<T>
    Sampling algorithm that picks 'k' random samples from streaming input.
    TokenizerChain
    An analyzer that uses a tokenizer and a list of token filters to create a TokenStream.
